channel.title: Net Neutrality GONE?
channel.description:
After reading that article, and watching that video, I was like WOW! @countries in EU: This ain't happening to us, it's happening to America
http://www.savetheinternet.com/net-neutrality-101
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=azAmiANwhJs
What do you guys think? o.O
for those who don't know what I'm talking about:
Basically, there's this law (I think) that allows us to get free internet, but now they want to remove that law, and make it so like people pay their ISP to get faster internet, and access websites. So if you can't afford to pay, you get the worst internet.

item.title: Net Neutrality GONE?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:5, topic:542945”]The UK might leave the EU, so this COULD effect us (I’m guessing).[/quote]Because obviously the UK would have no other option than to join the US as the 51st state.

Read full topic

item.title: Net Neutrality GONE?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Thank Tom for ruining the internet, he is in fact a big supporter of fast lanes since he has cash to back it up. Why do you think Moparscape has been running so well lately??? No server ot tools have been bought with the ad money either, why? Because no ad money is left, this man has used it all on upgrades to hardware so he can run a PI base server and get a contract with Jagex!

Yet another attempt to steal my information, good job NSA.

Read full topic
